title: David Davis – 2022 Comments on Harry Dunn
author: admin
summary: The comments made by David Davis, the Conservative MP for Haltemprice and Howden, on Twitter on 21 October 2022.
content:
My heart goes out to Harry Dunn’s parents. If Anne Sacoolas does not return to the U.K. for sentence we should suspend all extraditions to the USA other than for cases of murder, rape and terrorism. This one-sided treaty has allowed too many injustices.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
